title: Fairly heavy showers expected in parts of the island
byline: The Meteorology Department says several spells of showers will occur in Northern and Eastern provinces.

title: CAA continues raids on rice traders across the island
byline: The Consumer Affairs Authority (CAA) has announced that raids are continuing across the island to monitor rice traders and stocks.

title: Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation commits to expanding support in Sri Lanka
byline: The Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation has committed to expanding its initiatives in Sri Lanka, the President’s Media Division (PMD) stated.

title: Sri Lanka records nearly 1.9 million tourist arrivals in 2024
byline: The Sri Lanka Tourism Development Authority (SLTDA) has reported that nearly 1.9 million tourists have visited the island so far this year.

title: Sri Lanka’s new Speaker to be appointed on Dec. 17?
byline: Political observers have stated that the appointment of a new Speaker to fill the vacancy left by the resignation of Asoka Ranwala should likely take place on December 17.
